title: Mammal movements were boosted by human lockdowns
description: An international study of 43 land species found a 73% increase in maximum distances traveled by wild mammals during the strict lockdowns of spring 2020, which was enough to inspire animal protection policies.

title: Early modern humans over 80,000 years old found in Laos
description: The discovery of these fossils reinforces the hypothesis that our species left its African cradle multiple times before conquering the planet for good 60,000 years ago.
